glsa.title: ppp: Remote denial of service vulnerability
glsa.synopsis: pppd contains a vulnerability that may allow an attacker to crash the server.

background.p: ppp is a Unix implementation of the Point-to-Point Protocol.

description.p: The pppd server improperly verifies header fields, making it vulnerable to denial of service attacks.

impact.p: An attacker can cause the pppd server to access memory that it isn't allowed to, causing the server to crash. No code execution is possible with this vulnerability, because no data is getting copied.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
